Data Fields
Vps_DispCreateStatus Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display API

Create status for the display driver create call. This should be passed to the create function as a create status argument while creating the driver. More...

#include <vps_display.h>

Data Fields

Int32 retVal
 
UInt32 standard
 
UInt32 dispWidth
 
UInt32 dispHeight
 
UInt32 minNumPrimeBuf
 

Detailed Description

Create status for the display driver create call. This should be passed to the create function as a create status argument while creating the driver.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DispCreateStatus::dispHeight

[OUT] Height of the display at the VENC in linesto which the display driver path is connected.

UInt32 Vps_DispCreateStatus::dispWidth

[OUT] Width of the display at the VENC in pixels to which the display driver path is connected.

UInt32 Vps_DispCreateStatus::minNumPrimeBuf

[OUT] Minimum number of buffers to prime before starting display operation.

Int32 Vps_DispCreateStatus::retVal

[OUT] Return value of create call.

UInt32 Vps_DispCreateStatus::standard

[OUT] VENC Standard like NTSC, 1080p etc to which the display driver path is connected. For valid values see Fvid2_Standard.
